title: In photos: Most dramatic Bollywood hair makeovers
text:
In photos: Most dramatic Bollywood hair makeovers TNN | Feburary 21, 2017 1 /6 Bollywood's best hair makeovers 
Every Bollywood star loves to dress up and keep their fashion game on-trend, so why to keep the locks behind. From trendy colour to major chop, Bollywood divas love to experiment with their hair. Be it Kangana who went for a major chop or Priyanka who ditched her black locks, here are the best hair transformation of our favourite Bollywood stars: All Comments ()
